name: Survival Planet (itch)
description:
ATTENTION: This game is still under development, we're gradually increase the gameplay by updating it over the time. Only buy this game if you're happy with the game current state


Survival Planet is a 3D survival game that focused on surviving, crafting and finding other crew of the starship on the earth like planet called Aldebaran.

The player start as a survivor of the fallen starship who safely landed on the planet using an escape pod. When start the game, player will have only a single axe in his inventory to help him survive the environment. As the player proceed more into the game they will requiered to gather material to craft items such as tools, weapons, clothes, part of building, and more while gathering food and water, avoiding or hunting wild animals, and searching for other survivor.

The game currently features:

- Basic Survival such as hunting, crafting and gathering items

- A single Island map with 5000m x 5000m size

- 4 kinds of dangerous animals 

- 2 Alpha Animal

- Resource like Trees, bushes, stone and crystals

- 1 Crew member NPC

- 1 Story quest

Minimum Spec:

  • OS: windows 7/8/8.1/10
  • Processor: AMD A10 5750
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon HD 6870 2GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 12 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: the requirement maybe or may not be change during the development, this is just a simple guide

Patch 3.4.2

Wellcome and thank you very much for everyone who support us and bought this game. This game may not be completed yet but we are working hard to improve the quality of the game and now we presented to you the patch 3.4.2

what's new?

improvements:

- Adding 2 alpha animal into the game

bug fixes:

Patch 3.4.3

Hello guys, i hope you all good and healthy, once again i want to say thank you for all the people who supporting this game up until now. As my appreciation to you, i happily delivered the patch 3.4.3 update

what's new?

- Adding new animal: Wisp, this ellusive insect can be found all over the island
- Adding hit mark, now when your arrow hit animal a red crosshair will show up
- Adding ingame guide, you can access it by pressing G
- Adding Save and continue button, you can save your game without exiting it now and continue to play
- Berries now can give player a small amount of water in addition of small amount of food

Bug fix:

- Fixing cursor that sometimes not show up when open inventory
- Fixing multiple model spawn when placing structure, now only 1 type of model spawn at a time when you place structure 
- Fixing unable to save game after creating a furnace and stove, you can save your game safely now
